body.name: ZUBULUN Self Wringing Mop for Floor Cleaning with 2 Reusable Heads, Easy Squeeze Twist Mop with 57.5 Inches Long Handle and Top Scouring Pad, Wet Mops for Hardwood, Vinyl, Tile (Purple)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 9 mins
FREE pickup Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: PROTECT YOUR HANDS: ZUBULUN floor mop features with a ratchet in the handle to twist and wring water out of the string mop head, so you don’t need to touch dirty foam water.
2 MICROFIBER MOP HEAD: This micro twist mop system has excellent adsorption force, which can catch dust, hair and dirt tightly, making floor cleaning easier and simpler.
NON-SCRATCH SCRUB PAD: A scrubbing pad is attached on self squeeze mop head, which greatly helps removing stubborn stains on floors. It does no harm for floor.
MULTIPLE APPLICATION: This wringer mop performs well both as a dry mop and wet mop. Perfect for cleaning hardwood, tile, laminate, bamboo floor and all other kinds of floors.
EASY TO INSTALL & STORAGE: This tornado mop with 57.5 inches long handle is easy to assemble with a detailed instruction. You can easily hang it up without taking up much space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ZUBULUN Self Wringing Mop for Floor Cleaning with 2 Reusable Heads
reviews.reviewText: This mop does a great job cleaning, but it is not easy to squeeze. I can't get enough of the water out of the mop. Love it anyways as it does the job, I was hoping it would. It is easy to squeeze when dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Have not used yet..
reviews.reviewText: Met expectations, but not used yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scrubber on the bottom
reviews.reviewText: This mop is great for home use. I like the scrubber on the bottom. This really helps when the kids drop stuff on the floor, don't wipe it up, and it dries like cement. I also like that the mop head is removable and that it comes with an extra one. It was not hard to assemble at all. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mop has several problems...the design makes it hard to stay together, the mop head is hard to remove, but the worst thing is that once the mop is wet, it is impossibleto wring out as the weight of water does not permit you to be able to twist it. A very bad choice in a mop. I should have stuck to my original choice of the O-Cedar mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the mop, but with the long arm it is flimbsy. It will actually bend like its getting ready to break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice price good light twist floor mop
reviews.reviewText: Better than expected. Good quality at low price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great idea for a mop: works and saves space when done - at a very good value
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As you can see from the video, I use a collapsable bucket to save space (https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B09PVBMSNM/). In the same vein, I wanted a mop that didn't need its own shenanigans of a bucket draining system that takes half of my already-tiny-place to be stored. Then comes this heaven-sent idea which actually worked better than I expected. Assembly was pretty straightforward for me and it was ready to go in less than a minute! operating it was also simple, dip, ring, mop, then dip and ring again. Voilà! the cloth is really absorbent and yet, when rung properly, doesn't drip anymore and you can store it standing to dry. The fact that the head can be detached to be washed is genius, especially that the mop comes with two heads so you can keep using it while one is being washed. Additionally, the tip has a floor-safe scrub pad that you can use to deep clean certain spots when needed - pretty thoughtful! The stick is long enough to keep you comfortable when working, and all in all, I believe that along the price tag, this is pretty good deal. Okay, almost perfect, but could have been really perfect if a more neutral and subtle color was alternatively offered (like light grey?) but that's ok, won't snatch a star from a perfect score.+ Great space-saving idea: self-rings and can standup to dry+ Head can be washed separately, 2 heads are offered+ A non-scratch scrub pad comes on top for deep cleaning without ruining your floors+ Good quality and just the right length+ Easy assembly and operation- Why is that strong purple the only color option?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Basic mop for basic cleaning
reviews.reviewText: This mop will get the job done if you're casually cleaning but it's not good for bigger projects. it does absorb and does clean the dirt and grim. It just doesn't feel very heavy duty or sturdy to me. At points I had a difficult time getting the mop head off.It really does work, I've just had better mops in my life. For the price, it is worth it though.
